channel.title: 317 Interface that allows you to enter text
channel.description: Is there an interface that exists for the 317 client that pops up a frame at the bottom that allows you to enter text, very similar to the "add friend" interface? But I just want it to say "Enter text" instead of the "Enter a name you wish to add" text on the interface, because I know it's not possible to change the text on that. I need an interface like this for my clan chat system on my game. If anyone knows of an interface like this for a 317 client, let me know the id. Thanks.

line 8 in texthandler.java and IT IS A SENDQUEST!!![/quote]

Your fucking retarded. Everyone if they have a texthandlar.java is different. For you to say “Line 8” makes you seem like a complete idiot.
